channel.description: Your Home for Elon Musk Fact Checks!

item.title: Fact #4
item.description: Elon Musk failed remedial algebra in the eleventh grade. In revenge, he developed an intricate, untested mnemonic system for calculating the mathematical constant pi to the seventy thousandth place involving a story about an epohcal war between two feuding gypsy space clans called the Peeblos an...

item.title: Fact #3
item.description: Elon Musk has prehensile feet. He can eat bananas without using his hands.

item.title: Fact #2
item.description: Elon Musk was a dwarf until the age of nineteen.

item.title: Fact #1
item.description: At the age of three, Elon Musk shocked his boarding school classmates when, instead of taking the bus to the the petting zoo in Rietfontein, he excavated a twenty-three-mile tunnel, and using a solar-powered magnetic turbine, propelled himself to his destination twenty minutes before the others.
